EXPENDITURE PER DAY 
CHART 9 
: Expenditure Per Day in Neighbouring Tourist Destinations

An  analysis  of  expenditure  per  day 
reveals that the highest expenditure per day of USD 323.88 has been reported 
from  Maldives.  The  expenditure  per  day  for  Singapore  was  USD  316.49.  The 
expenditure per day recorded for Sri Lanka is USD 173.8. The lowest expenditure 
per day of USD 70.91 has been recorded from Indonesia.
